title: Cultural Adaptation of Social Work Education: Competency Enhancement Using Blended Learning and AI

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of social welfare theories and field experience
context.additional_context: Provides culturally contextualized social welfare education for current practitioners, operating in smartphone-based, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three social welfare practice strategies considering cultural differences in blended learning environments
Learners perform culturally contextualized decision-making in case analyses with over 80% accuracy using AI tools
Learners design cultural adaptation models of the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework and achieve scores of 4.0 or higher (5-point scale) in peer assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
